Good stuff here but lots of the titles are wrong. Most of the country is titled wrong.  Like George Strait - Give It Away is actually Trace Adkings - Ladies Love Country Boys, which doesn't even appear in the track list. Not taking anything away from the person that made ripped this but just FYI.

actually songman, I believe there is only one disc labeled wrong. I use tricerasoft cdg ripper to rip the original cdg and it labels them automatically. If you look up tyhe disc number from the manufacturer pop hits monthly, the tracks are all correct, just those few files are wrong. hope all have enjoyed these as they cost me a lot of money and time to rip....
